content.question: George sat next to Kiki in biology class every day. They often worked together on assignments. By the end of the semester, George became quite fond of Kiki. Which social psychological term best explains Georgeâ€™s attraction to Kiki?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
